references.paper_title: Mip-NeRF: A multiscale representation for anti-aliasing neural radiance fields
references.reason: This paper introduces Mip-NeRF, a significant advancement in neural radiance fields that addresses anti-aliasing issues, a key challenge in high-quality novel view synthesis.

references.paper_title: Mip-NeRF 360: Unbounded anti-aliased neural radiance fields
references.reason: Mip-NeRF 360 extends the capabilities of Mip-NeRF to handle unbounded scenes, a crucial improvement for realistic 3D reconstruction and rendering.

references.paper_title: 3D Gaussian splatting for real-time radiance field rendering
references.reason: This paper presents 3D Gaussian splatting (3DGS), a highly efficient and effective method for radiance field rendering that serves as the foundation for the proposed enhancement technique.

references.paper_title: Stable video diffusion: Scaling latent video diffusion models to large datasets
references.reason: This paper introduces Stable Video Diffusion, a powerful video diffusion model that is leveraged to achieve temporal consistency in the novel view synthesis enhancement pipeline.

references.paper_title: DNGaussian: Optimizing sparse-view 3D Gaussian radiance fields with global-local depth normalization
references.reason: This paper proposes DNGaussian, a method focusing on sparse-view 3D Gaussian radiance field optimization, which is directly compared against and improved upon by the proposed method.
